features: Before use, you can read the instructions for the inflator valve to help you quickly experience the product. If you encounter problems, please let us know first, because you are enjoying our 1-year free replacement service.

⚫【Neck Support】UROPHYLLA neck pillows - the humps on the top support your head and prevent the neck from leaning one way or the other, you can sleep several hours with ease on the flight and will not fall while sleeping, making the flight so much more bearable, no hand or neck pain.

⚫【100% Velvety Cover】The travel neck pillow uses soft velvet fabric that is non-irritating and odor, It has a comfortable non-sweat cover that can keep your face refreshing, perfect to replace an inflatable horseshoe-shaped travel pillow or memory foam pillows. Excellent comfort.

⚫【Adjustable Hardness】Blow up neck pillow is a perfect application of inflation technology, the valves is easily inflates (like 3 breaths/blows). You can create the best neck support and comfort by adding or decreasing air. Was also great for lower back support in the airline seat.

⚫【Ultra Small Space】Are you tired of the memory foam being too cumbersome to take in a backpack? We can, our neck pillow packs down to a little larger than a soda can, fit in your briefcase, or hang it from your bag. You will no longer be one of those people with the big-neck banana walking around with their luggage, just what you needed for a long flight and backpack trip.

⚫【Neck Pillows for Pain Relief】Have you still thought neck pillows were some stupid gimmick? when you are required to sit in front of a computer for 12+ hours or need to endure 9+ hours of flying, this cooler travel pillow can help with a very stiff neck and fatigue. Used on cars, planes, trains, and office nap. Don't want one?

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Machine Washable Pillowcase The high-quality soft velvet fabric can relax the skin of the face and neck, bring you a stress-free travel sleep. The hidden zipper is convenient to take out the inner tank. Please note: the inner tank cannot be cleaned directly, just wipe it with a cloth. Adjustable Cord Buckle The hump rope buckle design effectively prevents the head from tilting down excessively and protects the health of the cervical spine. Suitable for necks of 10-18 inches, you can freely adjust the angle of the neck pillow to reduce neck soreness. Compact Travel Pillow The folded size is 3.7*6.9 inch, and the weight is 0.42 pounds. The lightweight and foldable design add portability to your travel. If you are still using a cumbersome or space-wasting neck pillow, do not hesitate. This compression travel pillow is the best choice for your trave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nifty travel pillow!
reviews.reviewText: I like this pillow a lot! It is user friendly, and holds the air well! It takes maybe 3-4 breaths to inflate, and is easy to roll ip and fit back in its travel bag! I love that it is soft and not scratchy, like some inflatable pillows. Would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice for plane rides
reviews.reviewText: I don’t have much meat on me so plane flights or long car rides are often very painful to be sitting that long so I like to deflate this a little and sit on it like a cushion, it does not deflate with my weight at all, and is very comfortable. I also like to buy the cheapest flights I can find so they end up not having headrests or any room to lean over and nap so having this to hold my head up while I sleep is a huge help so I don’t have a really sore neck when I wake up. It’s also decently compact when in the bag, and blows up with 1-3 breaths, deflates super quick and easy too. Great product, highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used this on a 3 week trip to Scotland and Ireland. It was easy to inflate and easy to pack up after each use. I'm glad I purchased it for the trip. Nice and soft fleece outer fabric.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and collapses to a very convenient size.
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. I bought one a few months ago and instantly fell in love with it, because it is made of a velvety comfortable material, and it collapses into a size that fits into my bag easily. It also comes with a bag that protects it while it is in my bag. I accidentally left mine on a plane and I instantly ordered a replacement and one for every member of my family for our recent trip to Asia. They all loved the product and slept well on the plane. I have in the past bought foam neck pillows at the airport for as much as $35 that are not collapsible and which therefore get disposed of. This product is more comfortable! I was surprised at how easy it was to inflate. Very few puffs are required to completely inflate it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Could Not Get Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This blows up and deflates easily, perfect for packing (although did not go back in the pouch). I used the pouch for the eyemask, replaced the ear plugs with some I like better (kept the provided case), and added my ear pods to the pouch. The material is soft and (after airing a few days) odor free - but I was never able to find a comfortable position with it - I cannot say if that's me or the neck design. Worth a try is the best I can offer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Travel Pillow I've Ever Seen
reviews.reviewText: Deflateable for easy storage -- this is key. You don't have to hang it on your bag and drag it around the airport only to put your head on it later. You don't have to wear it through the airport like some unfashionable garment. I have yet to successfully jam it back into it's original bag, so I just keep it loose in my carry-on, which makes it easier for me to access when needed anyway. It inflates to whatever firmness or softness I want and it holds the air. The little valve cover isn't mounted well (just uses a snap-on plastic ring) so on mine fell off on the plane and I was luck to find it bc otherwise (a) the valve where you place your mouth gets dirty, and (b) without the secondary seal there may be some slight leakage over along trips. The cover is soft, plush, and very comfortable. If you sweat in hot weather the cover remains comfortable and is removable for washing (though I have not yet tried this, I suspect hand washing to avoid shrinkage may be needed). The matching color ear plugs are a nice touch but compared to other foam earplugs I've used the foam on the ones I got with my pillow is too firm to insert well into the ear so they don't seal out the noise as well as similar plugs. The eye shades are great. I never thought I would need them until I tried them. The eye cup shape that keeps the mask from hitting your eyelashes is a small but important comfort feature when you are trying to sleep. I have travelled with the product from North to South America on a total of 15 flights lasting up to 8 or 12 hours. My dozen or so travel companions are always jealous of this product compared to whatever they have. I would buy again and will give for gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Pillow - This is the One :)
reviews.reviewText: I'm so glad I purchased this. It folds down really small, so it's convenient to carry and store when you're not using it.It inflates quickly and is very supportive! The cover is very soft and easy to fall asleep on. It also deflates rapidly with the awesome valve design. Love this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for backpackers who need a neck pillow, but don't want to have to carry it around
reviews.reviewText: I went on a 30 day backpacking trip to Japan recently, so I needed a neck pillow for the 12+ hours I would be traveling in the plane, but light enough and small enough to backpack with and not add too much unnecessary weight to my backpack.I could have gotten a better one and thrown it out at the airport upon arrival, but I didn't want to and I was backpacking in a foreign country so I wasn't sure I could get one to fix my size and I wasn't in one place long enough to order one off amazon.The nice thing about this one is it's an air bladder inside and a felt like material outside. so it's comfortable and feels good. you can adjust how soft or firm it is easily by pushing on the valve and letting air out or blowing into it. The material can get a little hot if it stays in one place for too long, but this was easily remedied but either taking it off for a min or moving it around. it only took a couple seconds to inflate and was easy to do so. I usually inflated it just about make and then once I was sat in my seat I would put it on and adjust the firmness using my finger to let air out until it fell right. the clips were a nice touch I didn't worry about it falling off it I got up from my seat or moved around a bunch, they also acted like a nice fidget toy.Because I was backpacking and would only end up using this during my plane rides I need something lightweight enough that I could carry it around the entire trip and not add any unnecessary weight. the pillow plus the bag weighted 181 grams, so it was perfect. It was also small so i would shove into what ever corner I could find in my backpack. I also could have used as an extra pillow while backpacking but I never did. This is never going to be as comfortable as a nice memory foam or bead one, but it did the job.

Great option for travelling when you don’t want to lug around a full sized pillow. This deflates and rolls up easy! Also blows up easily and quickly not leaving you out of breath. Soft cover is nice and cozy!

reviews.reviewTitle: Inflable excelente, practico no ocupa espacio.
reviews.reviewText: Excelente lo usé para viajes de poco más de 10 horas y la practicidad de ser inflable fué muy bueno, se infló en 2 soplidos, los tapones cumplen su función.
Very compact and worth the price. Very nice material and big enough to keep head more upright for long flight

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable. Easy to inflate. No worries.
reviews.reviewText: A little big when folded up (-1) so will not fit into a pocket. Other than that, very comfy and simple to inflate. Hopefully will not leak. Trying it out soon and will update with issues. The sleep mask was a nice add-on although really cheap.

reviews.reviewTitle: So Soft & with a Small Carry Pouch
reviews.reviewText: Love it and perfect size to carry around with its pouch before going in the plane - rather than the bulky foam travel pillow. Haven’t use it as yet but soon. I played with it at home - oh so soft and comfy. Reasonable price too.
